DOC.brief_summary: As a T2T, our patients with idiopathic inflammatory myopathies will receive pulse therapies with methyprednisolone and/or human intravenous immunoglobulin, or only methyprednisolone at disease onset. This scheme is an internal routine protocol of our Service.
